caption:
King for a Day, by @cedarwright 

People compare Paragliding to chess in the sky.¬† I think this analogy is faulty. I once¬†heard, ‚ÄúParagliding is like playing chess with dice that are a round.‚Äù ¬†Closer to the truth?¬†¬†I think chasing XC records is a little bit like fishing.¬†¬†You cast your line and hope you catch a big one.¬† Really, Paragliding is closer to poker than chess... a game of skill and chance. ¬† 

This winter in Roldanillo I played my cards and launched my line into some absolutely epic weather. I arrived with the pie in the sky goal of breaking the FAI record for what is probably the most popular winter paragliding destination in the world.¬† Success was unlikely, but I‚Äôve been working on my delusional self-belief.¬†

¬†On the 25th of January I realized an unlikely dream and put myself and the USA flag at the top of the Roldanillo x-contest score! I pushed, I believed, and I closed a 219 Km magical mystery tour of the Valle de Cauca.¬†¬†Elated and exhausted, I rested.¬† My glory was short-lived. The next day Bogdan Bialka took his record back pushing it to 230!¬† And‚Ä¶ the next day Kevin Phillip took to the sky with a vengeance setting a new record of 236 km‚Ä¶legend.¬† The Roldanillo¬†FAI record was beaten 3 days in a row!¬† I spent the next two weeks in an absurd version of paragliding Groundhog Day trying to reclaim the record.¬† On three separate occasions, the dream was within grasp but shut down by the unpredictable Pacifico winds and a pace that just wasn‚Äôt fast enough. It‚Äôs fair to say that this was a historic season for Paragliding in Roldanillo.¬† 

Of the top 50 scored flights on x-contest, 46 of them were from this year!¬†¬†It‚Äôs more the journey than the destination, and I‚Äôm grateful for the motivation that being a record chasing psychopath gave me.¬† Epic scenery, wild low saves, thousands of kms, and almost 200 hours of full-bar obsession on my Enzo and Sub.¬†While the Rolda. FAI record is more elusive than ever, I‚Äôm grateful that I got to be king for a day, and learned a ton about paragliding and the power of delusional self-belief.... ¬†which is why I‚Äôll be taking the record back next year.¬†

#flyozone
You only climb as good as you look, which is why @nmilfeld and I climb so good.

One of my goals when starting The Dirtbag Fund was to collaborate with young filmmakers to create content celebrating some of the grantees!  I‚Äôm excited to present my first piece of DBF content‚Ä¶Head over to my YouTube (link in profile) to watch the short film ‚ÄúMay, They, She‚Äù shot, directed and edited by @trevorlately and starring the legendary bad ass @heyitsmayjay May used the 1k dirtbag grant to offer a free 2 day skills retreat that got some folks out of the city and into the gunks to introduce them to outdoor climbing!  May is sweet and giving person who is very busy working to promote equity in climbing for all people in NYC through partners like @nycclimbingcollective @riseoutsidecollective @heyflashfoxy @browngirlsclimb @kinshipclimbingcollective ‚Ä¶. Also THANKS to @fattire @thenorthface @lasportivana @blackdiamond who all contributed to making this possible.

‚ÄúI should post something to my main feed, it‚Äôs been over a month.‚Äù All I look at are stories anymore, but‚Ä¶here are some randoms living in my phone from the @thenorthface expedition to Antarctica 2017!  All time crew and location! @conrad_anker @sav.cummins @pfaff_anna @jimmychin @pablo_durana @alexhonnold

Valle de Bravo 23/24.  I‚Äôve been coming here for winter paragliding since I became addicted to this outrageous sport 9 years ago!  It‚Äôs a true paragliding Mecca!  I Rode into the new year exploring new deeper lines and honing my competition skills and came away with personal bests in both disciplines in this venue.  The 19th annual Monarca was a blast and I managed a respectable 20th out of over 140 pilots, but the highlight of the trip was flying a unique new line into the deepness of Mexico with @sprodigality  It was a total outrageous adventure which I will never forget! Thanks @ozoneparagliders for the Ferrari like magic carpet that is the Enzo 3 and @thenorthface! üëä‚ù§Ô∏è
Approaching the new year with a more serious approach to climbing.  @readysetgalen doesn‚Äôt let an extraterrestrial life form get in the way of her sending the purple route‚Ä¶so inspiring.
My present to you! @allterrainbernie love and adventure to all and to all a sendy new year. üéÖüêï

Dirtbag Fund Grantees send big!  A big belated congrats to @crustacean_black @mtngangsta and @hayden.arthur.wyatt for their first ascent of ‚ÄúBrilliant Blue‚Äù 850m, 80*, Al3, M7+, on White Sapphire peak 6040m in the Kishtwar Valley India.  I remember my first expedition to Baffin and what a life changing experience it was and I‚Äôm happy to have offered 1k to this worthy cause.  The boys also had support from @americanalpine üëä‚ù§Ô∏è as well.  Of all the projects I‚Äôm working on these days, the dirtbag fund brings me the most joy and I‚Äôm excited for the future! I‚Äôm going to be working with @crustacean_black on a short film about their adventure to help promote and grow the dirtbag fund, so look for that next year!  Also I‚Äôm close to having the infrastructure up and running for a smoother next round of grants so stay tuned for more about that in the new year.  Excited to hear from more dirtbags soon! Thanks to all the brands that supported this first round of grants including @fattire @lasportivana @thenorthface and @blackdiamond ü´∂üôè

My annual trip to my home away from home in Santa Barbara was a delight.  Winter thermals, chossy sport crags, friends who are family, kiddos, and doggies galore!  Sending love and hopes for adventure to all as the new year creeps close!
Thinking about a career as a hand-model.  Photo @jimmychin üá¶üá∂ 2017

A quick deep water solo mission with @shawnraboutou @honngy @bookofsamuel @sheneenagins and @felipe.camargo during the @thenorthface athlete summit in Sardinia.  Especially impressive watching Matty climb to the 75 foot mark on hard climbing then down climb a bit and huck off! üí™üëä

Not all goes to plan! Dirt Bag Fund recipient @etaiveaho had a proper epic in Washington!  Legendary trip report from Emilio here!  Next round of dirtbag fund applications opening soon! In Emilio‚Äôs words: ‚ÄúThis summer i got lucky enough to be one of the recipients of Cedar Wright‚Äôs dirtbag fund! this was the only time being a dirt bag paid in money as well as experiences. For a while now  I‚Äôve been going into the backcountry every summer‚Äîmountaineering, climbing, and eating homemade dehydrated eggs for weeks (sometimes months) at a time. Outside of that I‚Äôve been maximizing a dirtbag life by living in an RV in rural North Carolina, splitting my time between grad school and climbing, honing my trad skills and getting repeated tastes of humble pie at Moores Wall and Stone Mountain. This spring I used up the last of my cash to buy plane tickets to fly out to Washington and was ready to be completely broke until the dirtbag fund came to my rescue! Crisis averted: Thank you Cedar!! As soon as I arrived in Washington, my climbing partner Mo and I hit the road towards the Olympics, where we repeated Wayne Wallace‚Äôs ‚ÄúSawtooth Ridge.‚Äù Sawtooth was one of the best climbs I‚Äôve had the privilege of doing, with some cerebral and delicious leads. The choss got the best of us, though, and Mo and I both ended up in the hospital.. Mo for a shoulder injury and I for a rectal prolapse and sphincter incision after a fall. While we were able to walk ourselves out of the Olympics, these injuries kept us out of the pickets for the season. I used up more of the dirtbag funds to pay for the hospital bills, some salmon, and a ride back to NC. As I was healing in NC, I was climbing as much as possible and getting some exposure therapy. Eventually I was able to bum around and climb in West Virginia and was comforted by bulletproof rock... I drained the fund on gas money, and got to climb all over the Linville Gorge. 
Although my main objectives were put on pause because of the injury, the stoke for dirtbaggery is at an all time high!!!‚Äù
